      • getInstance

        public static SHLocation getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Returns Instance of SHLocation Class
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        Returns:
        instance of SHLocation class

      • stopLocationReporting

        public void stopLocationReporting()
        Function to stop application to report location to StreetHawk. The function stops location reporting till startLocationReporting is called again.

      • reportWorkHomeLocationsOnly

        public void reportWorkHomeLocationsOnly()
        Use reportWorkHomeLocationsOnly if you want to calculate work and home locations only

      • setActivityLifecycleCallbacks

        public static void setActivityLifecycleCallbacks(android.app.Application app)
        Core uses setActivityLifecycleCallbacks to register to activity lifecycle call backs
        Parameters:
        app -

      • startLocationReporting

        public void startLocationReporting()
        Call this function to start reporting user's location to StreetHawk server

      • restartLocationReporting

        public void restartLocationReporting()
        Restart location reporting from broadcast when location is enabled on device. Application need not call this function at all.

      • updateLocationMonitoringParams

        public void updateLocationMonitoringParams(int UPDATE_INTERVAL_FG,
                                  int UPDATE_DISTANCE_FG,
                                  int UPDATE_INTERVAL_BG,
                                  int UPDATE_DISTANCE_BG)
        Update intervals for minimum distance and time update for locations.
        Parameters:
        UPDATE_INTERVAL_FG - min time between two location reporting calls when app is in foreground
        UPDATE_DISTANCE_FG - min distance between two location reporting calls when app is in foreground
        UPDATE_INTERVAL_BG - min time between two location reporting calls when app is in backgrond
        UPDATE_DISTANCE_BG - min distance between two location reporting calls when app is in background
